title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day with 3 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a city street with moderate traffic and 3 braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 5.7 m/s). There are 3 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a straight, 4-lane city street with a yellow traffic line on the left side. There are several cars and a parked truck on the right side of the road. The traffic light is green and there are no pedestrians visible. The weather is clear and sunny.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed and follows the traffic rules. It slows down and stops at the traffic light, then accelerates again when the light turns green. It keeps a safe distance from the parked truck and other cars on the road. The driver is attentive and reacts to the braking events ahead.
